column3: fancy chain stores and high-end art galleries make trendy SoHo a top shopping destination
column4: especially for out-of-towners. Known for its elegant cast-iron-facades and cobblestone streets
column5: the neighborhood is also an atmospheric backdrop for fashionable crowds clustering at high-end restaurants and nightlife hotspots.
